recipesJson.name: Got Dang Betterest Fruity Loopy Loops
recipesJson.author: Jerrysnaps
recipesJson.description: Just a quick and simple fruit loops mix. Cap Fruit Circles SL is the dream. Originally when I bought this flavor I expected to do more with it. Instead I went through the 10ml in less than a week with just this. A 4oz later this is still the current ADV.

reviews.text: I am really liking this mix right now. I usually don’t enjoy cereal profiles. This is not one of them. I am not turned off by all the sweetener. I have fat boy problems. The flavor is light and great for an ADV.. 👍🏻👍🏻
dude 1.25% super sweet?? must be a typo right?

pageContext.name: Got Dang Betterest Fruity Loopy Loops
